For the last 10 years, we have all been equally involved in making decisions. This triumvirate approach has real benefits in terms of shared wisdom, and we will continue to discuss the big decisions among the three of us. But we have also agreed to clarify our individual roles so there's clear responsibility and accountability at the top of the company, Eric Schmidt wrote in a blog post announcing the management moves. Saying his`` heart was in Indiana,'' Mike Pence said he would continue to meet with the good and strong and opinionated people of this state before deciding his next move. During a question-and-answer session, Mike Pence said his proudest moment as a congressman came when he helped a Muncie mother avoid deportation to her home country of Sierra Leone.
